titles: More proofs of infants church-membership and consequently their right to baptism, or, A second defence of our infant rights and mercies in three parts ... / by Richard Baxter.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
publisher: Printed for N. Simmons and J. Robinson ...,
notes: Parts 2 and 3 have special title pages.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.

(from t.p.) The plain proof of Gods statute or covenant for infants church membership, and a confutation of Mr. Tombes, his arguments against infants church-membership -- A confutation of the strange forgeries of Mr. H. Danvers against the antiquity of infant-baptism -- Animadversions on Mr. Danvers's reply to Mr. Willes.
